meta.name: Analyze crypto markets with CoinGecko MCP and C1

parameters.content:
### Step 1: Enable Chat

1. In n8n, open the Chat node in your workflow.

2. Make Chat Publicly available.

3. Copy the Chat URL. You will need it in the next step.


### Step 2: Setup Thesys

![](https://www.thesys.dev/n8n/n8n-step-2.png)

1. [Go to Thesys Console and log in](https://console.thesys.dev/keys)

2. Generate a new API key and copy it somewhere safe.

3. In n8n, open the Model node in your workflow.

4. In the Credentials section, click Create New to add a new credential.

5. Paste your Thesys API key into the API Key field.

6. Update the Base URL to - https://api.thesys.dev/v1/embed and save the credential.

7. Back in the Model section of the node, select the model you want to use
(for example: c1/openai/gpt-5/v20251230) and save the node.

## Analyze crypto markets with interactive graphs using CoinGecko and C1 by Thesys

This n8n template   can answer questions about **real-time prices, market moves, trending coins, and token details** with **interactive UI in real time** (cards, charts, buttons) instead of plain text using C1 by Thesys. Data is fetched through the **CoinGecko Free MCP tool**.

### [Check out a working demo of this template here](https://www.thesys.dev/n8n?url=https://www.thesys.dev/n8n?url=https%3A%2F%2Fasd2224.app.n8n.cloud%2Fwebhook%2F51638b0c-7765-4fa8-9b95-a0422128e203%2Fchat).

### What this workflow does
1. A user sends a message in the **n8n Chat** UI (public chat trigger).
2. The **AI Agent** interprets the request.
3. The agent calls **CoinGecko Free MCP** to fetch market data (prices, coins, trending, etc.).
4. The model responds through **C1 by Thesys** with a **streaming, UI** answer.

### Example prompts you can try right away
Copy/paste any of these into the chat:

- ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs the current price of Bitcoin and Ethereum?‚Äù
- ‚ÄúGive me today‚Äôs market summary: total market cap, BTC dominance, top gainers/losers.‚Äù
- ‚ÄúCompare ETH vs SOL over 30 days with a chart.‚Äù

> Note: This template is for information and visualization, not financial advice.


### How it works

1. User sends a prompt
2. C1 model based on prompt will use CoinGecko MCP to fetch live data
3. C1 Model generates a UI Schema Response
4. Schema is rendered as UI using Thesys GenUI SDK on the frontend


### Setup 

Make sure you have the following:

#### 1Ô∏è‚É£  Thesys API Key
You‚Äôll need an API key to authenticate and use Thesys services.

üëâ Get your key [here](https://console.thesys.dev/keys)  

### What is C1 by Thesys?
C1 by [Thesys](https://www.thesys.dev/)  is an API middleware that augments LLMs to respond with **interactive UI (charts, buttons, forms)** in real time instead of text.

### Video Tutorial

@[youtube](0rtdVfjKJ-M)

### Facing setup issues?
#### If you get stuck or have questions:

- #### üí¨ Join the [Thesys Community](https://discord.com/invite/Pbv5PsqUSv)  
- #### üìß Email support:  support@thesys.dev

### Step 2: Activate the Workflow

1. At the top of the n8n editor, click the Active / Inactive toggle.

2. Confirm the workflow status is set to Active.


### Step 3: Try It Out

1. Open [Thesys N8N page](https://www.thesys.dev/n8n)

2. Paste your Chat URL into the input box.

3. Send a test message to confirm everything is working.

## UI Agent
This agent can reason, use tools and returns results as interactive UI
